Description: Incurving rim and wall sherd of possibly Attic pottery top-band stemless cup; inside, narrow reserved band below lip, wholly glazed below; exterior: wide reserved band in handle zone; glazed above and below; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 444)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0669) (Phase 1)
